## Metadata

::: justify
Here, we show individual information for the each of the studies compiled in Safeguard (see Study_id column). The authors with their contact information is provided below (see Authorship section).

:::


```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, fig.width = 10}

library(readr)
library(kableExtra)

d = read_csv("Data/Metadata.csv")

kable(d, booktabs = T, linesep = "\\addlinespace", caption = "Table 1") %>%
kable_styling(full_width = F,font_size = 14) %>% 
row_spec(0, bold=T)

```
